title: Arbor Gates at Buckhead
posting_body: Arbor Gates at Buckhead
Thank you for inquiring about an apartment at Arbor Gates at Buckhead!
We are pleased that you have chosen to relocate to Buckhead!
Our community offers vibrant trees amidst amazing landscaping.
We have a state of the art 3-story Fitness Center, one swimming pool, a car wash and a dog park.
There are 4 charcoal grills on the property for your added convenience.
If you want to relax and unwind while taking in amazing views, visit our rooftop deck located above the gym.
We recently renovated the rooftop’s flooring and soon plan to add furniture.
Our apartments bear granite countertops and updated appliances, and even include microwaves and a washer and dryer at no additional cost.
Each building has its own elevator, allowing access to the parking garage or any floor of the building with comfort and ease!
Our prices are as follows:
650 sq ft one bedroom one bathroom: $1,409
750 sq ft one bedroom one bathroom: $1,509
1000 sq ft two bedrooms one bathroom: $1,649
1100 sq ft two bedrooms two bathrooms: $1,759
***PRICES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE***
There is a flat rate for water/sewer/trash for each apartment: One Bedroom One Bathroom is $65.00, Two Bedroom One Bathroom is $70.00, and Two Bedroom Two Bathroom is $80.00.
Arbor Gates at Buckhead is a pet friendly community, we welcome your furry friends!
The pet deposit is $200.00 and the pet fee is $500.00.
You may apply for and reserve an apartment at the same time.
Complete our online application, where you’ll submit payment for an application fee of $100.00 per person, an administration fee of $150.00.
You may also visit our office during leasing hours to apply and pay in person.
Our office is open 7 days each week.
Please feel free to reply via email or call our office with any questions or concerns you may have.
We are eager to hear from you and are more than happy to schedule a tour with you!
When is the best time to schedule a tour of our property?
Thank you and have a wonderful day!
Devin Hammett & Deborah Washington
